comment:
* Data about the current brightness state.
 * {@see android.view.Display.getBrightnessInfo()}
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: HIGH_BRIGHTNESS_MODE_OFF
variables.comment:
* High brightness mode is OFF. The high brightness range is not currently accessible to the
     * user.

variables.name: HIGH_BRIGHTNESS_MODE_SUNLIGHT
variables.comment:
* High brightness mode is ON due to high ambient light (sunlight). The high brightness range is
     * currently accessible to the user.

variables.name: HIGH_BRIGHTNESS_MODE_HDR
variables.comment:
* High brightness mode is ON due to high ambient light (sunlight). The high brightness range is
     * currently accessible to the user.

variables.name: BRIGHTNESS_MAX_REASON_THERMAL
variables.comment: * Maximum brightness is restricted due to thermal throttling.

variables.name: BRIGHTNESS_MAX_REASON_POWER_IC
variables.comment: * Maximum brightness is restricted due to power throttling.

variables.name: BRIGHTNESS_MAX_REASON_WEAR_BEDTIME_MODE
variables.comment: * Maximum brightness is restricted due to the Wear bedtime mode.

variables.name: highBrightnessTransitionPoint
variables.comment: Brightness values greater than this point are only used in High Brightness Mode.

variables.name: highBrightnessMode
variables.comment:
* Current state of high brightness mode.
     * Can be any of HIGH_BRIGHTNESS_MODE_* values.

variables.name: brightnessMaxReason
variables.comment:
* The current reason for restricting maximum brightness.
     * Can be any of BRIGHTNESS_MAX_REASON_* values.

methods.name: public static String hbmToString(@HighBrightnessMode int highBrightnessMode)
methods.comment: * @return User-friendly string for specified {@link HighBrightnessMode} parameter.

methods.name: public static String briMaxReasonToString(@BrightnessMaxReason int reason)
methods.comment: * @return User-friendly string for specified {@link BrightnessMaxReason} parameter.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public static String hbmToString(@HighBrightnessMode int highBrightnessMode)
public static String briMaxReasonToString(@BrightnessMaxReason int reason)
public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
